experiences.description: Developed a prototype recommendation system using collaborative filtering techniques, improving product recommendations by 15%. Utilized Python and scikit-learn for model implementation and evaluation. Contributed to data cleaning and preprocessing efforts.

Designed, built, and maintained scalable data pipelines using Spark, Hadoop, and AWS services (S3, EC2, EMR). Improved data processing efficiency by 30% through optimization of Spark jobs. Implemented data quality monitoring systems to ensure data accuracy and reliability. Collaborated with data scientists to provide them with clean and accessible data for machine learning models. Led the migration of on-premise data warehouse to AWS Redshift.

Led the development and implementation of a real-time data streaming platform using Kafka and Apache Flink. Designed and implemented data models for various business units, ensuring data consistency and accessibility. Mentored junior data engineers and provided technical guidance.  Responsible for the architecture and implementation of the company's data governance policies. Contributed to the development of a new data lake using Delta Lake on Databricks.

education.description: GPA: 3.8/4.0.  Relevant coursework included data structures, algorithms, database systems, and machine learning.  President of the Computer Science Club.
Specialized in Big Data Analytics.  Thesis: "Scalable Data Mining Techniques for Large-Scale Social Networks."  Published research paper in the International Conference on Data Engineering (ICDE).
